data.message:
Good evening you gorgeous palindrome, you!
Why is it that I would be just talking about you to someone who has a vested interest in my wellbeing, & then who should be there to greet me this evening, but, none other than the fantastic Lyrical Miracle lll!!!!
How amusing! The predictive text just turned your Roman's into lol!!!!
I do hope you are laughing with me, Young Man?!
A father of such calibre, would be expected to be a Gentleman, at the best of times, wouldn't you agree, Angel?
However, my other half is still in a raw state of denial, & I was just wondering if I might borrow some wheels, & maybe chuck in an escort while you're at it, could you?
I'm afraid I'm a tad empty, all round, & am in desperate need of the Spa morning, I have booked on Saturday! I am looking for a lunch date, when I've finished, if you care to join me?
You've got just enough time to get your hair in a better Shade, Slim!!!!
Step to it now?!
I have an Army of Children to educate, & I require the assistance of a GENIUS!!!!
Are YOU with ME????
3773

replies.message: Can I just add, The Colour Purple goes very well with Platinum! Cx 😚
